title: High Contrast Serif
content:
Any idea what this typeface is? I'm guessing one of the Caslon family but not exactly sure. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bespoke_LH_2_3845.jpg)

Font: 

 ITC Caslon No.224 Black 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193903/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

author: cewang999

comments.content:
ITC Caslon 224 Black (also used as a web font on their site):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/caslon-no-224/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193903/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/caslon-no-224/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/caslon-no-224/")
With a title like that, I would have expected a bespoke typeface! ;-)
